document.full_text: a jailed murderer ordered his brother to dig up the corpse of a former president and hide it so he could negotiate his release from prison, a court ruled monday.
document.title: europe: cyprus: corpse was bargaining chip
lines_and_colors: a jailed murderer ordered his brother to dig up the corpse of a former president and hide it so he could negotiate his release from prison, a court ruled monday.
